Initializer# init(_:in:)

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
init?<S>(
    _ range: NSRange,
    in string: S
) where S : AttributedStringProtocol
```

Available when `Bound` is `AttributedString.Index`.
